description: Dice Tower is a handy way to carry around all the dice you will ever need.  It comes with all of the standard dice defined, but its real strength is that it gives you the ability to define your own dice rolls.  Everything from 2d6 to dice pools to arbitrary valued dice is possible.  It even allows you to tag results, so now your phone can tell you which location your missile just hit, instead of constantly referring to lookup tables.  On top of this, Dice Tower also allows you to define which dice rolls appear on the screen (up to 8 currently) so you can concentrate on your game instead of navigating around the application.  Suggestions for new features and improvements are very welcome and encouraged!  *Changelog for 1.0.1: Fixed bug in display of sum in Dice Pool roll.
